item.title: Report X-2025040041
item.description:
Report X-2025040041

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-25
  • City: WEST COLUMBIA
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: CALLED TO M1 BELT OF IRREGS AREA FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE. WENT TO AREA. RESPONDED TO PACKAGE USING THE DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEETS. CONTAINERIZED PACKAGE AND CLEAN UP MATERIALS IN A SPILL TRAY AND RETURNED TO THE DMP CAGE FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
